scripts.clean: del-cli android/build example/android/build example/android/app/build example/ios/build lib
scripts.bootstrap: yarn example && yarn install && yarn example pods update && yarn codegen:android
scripts.enable:newarch:ios: (/usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'Set :RCTNewArchEnabled true' example/ios/StorylyPlacementReactNativeExample/Info.plist 2>/dev/null || /usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'Add :RCTNewArchEnabled bool true' example/ios/StorylyPlacementReactNativeExample/Info.plist) && cd example/ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 pod update && cd ../.. && echo 'New Architecture ENABLED for iOS'
scripts.enable:newarch:android: cd example/android && ORG_GRADLE_PROJECT_newArchEnabled=true ./gradlew --refresh-dependencies --no-daemon && cd ../.. && echo 'New Architecture ENABLED for Android'
scripts.disable:newarch:ios: (/usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'Set :RCTNewArchEnabled false' example/ios/StorylyPlacementReactNativeExample/Info.plist 2>/dev/null || /usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'Add :RCTNewArchEnabled bool false' example/ios/StorylyPlacementReactNativeExample/Info.plist) && cd example/ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 pod update && cd ../.. && echo 'New Architecture DISABLED for iOS'
scripts.disable:newarch:android: cd example/android && ORG_GRADLE_PROJECT_newArchEnabled=false ./gradlew --refresh-dependencies --no-daemon && cd ../.. && echo 'New Architecture DISABLED for Android'
scripts.invalidate-cache: del-cli yarn.lock node_modules android/build android/.gradle android/.idea example/node_modules example/yarn.lock example/android/.gradle example/android/.idea example/android/build ios/Pods
